articles.title: Tim Scott: Pelosi not taking Trump impeachment battle 'seriously': 'The wacky House process is just a joke'

articles.author: Andrew Dalton
articles.title: Lee Mendelson, executive producer of 'A Charlie Brown Christmas,' dies at 86
articles.description: Lee Mendelson, the producer who changed the face of the holidays when he brought “A Charlie Brown Christmas” to television in 1965 and wrote the lyrics to its signature song, “Christmas Time Is Here,” died on Christmas day, his son said.
articles.content:
Lee Mendelson, the producer who changed the face of the holidays when he brought “A Charlie Brown Christmas” to television in 1965 and wrote the lyrics to its signature song, “Christmas Time Is Here,” died on Christmas Day, his son said.

articles.title: Gregg Jarrett says McConnell should hold impeachment trial -- without Pelosi's OK
articles.description: Fox News legal analyst Gregg Jarrett blasted House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., on Friday for not sending the articles of impeachment to the Senate for trial and saying that Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., should proceed with an impeachment …

articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: Don Imus clash with Clintons at DC correspondents dinner in 1996 was among controversial moments
articles.description: Radio and TV host Don Imus, who died Friday at age 79, saw his share of controversies, big and small, in a career that spanned nearly 50 years. His clash with the Clintons in 1996 ranks among the big ones.
articles.content:
Radio and TV host Don Imus, who died Friday at age 79, sparked his share of controversies, big and small, in a career that spanned nearly 50 years. His clash with the Clintons in 1996 ranks among the big ones.
Imus was the featured entertainment that year at… [+2464 chars]

articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: Hunter Biden, wife missing from Biden family Christmas photo posted on Twitter
articles.description: Hunter Biden and his wife, Melissa, were conspicuously absent from a family Christmas photo posted by former Vice President Joe Biden on Christmas Day.
articles.content:
Hunter Biden and his wife, Melissa, were conspicuously absent from a family Christmas photo posted by former Vice President Joe Biden on Christmas Day.

articles.author: Charles Creitz
articles.title: Tammy Bruce: Trump critic Joe Scarborough trying to play 'Mister Rogers' with embrace of 'Love thy neighbor' politics
articles.description: MSNBC morning show host Joe Scarborough is now hypocritically clamoring for a new 'love thy neighbor' brand of politics after years of attacking President Trump as a "thug" and "not well," according to Fox News contributor Tammy Bruce.
articles.content:
